participant_1.background:
I love to work with my hands and create things.
I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends.
I am looking for a home that is large enough for my family and has a good school district.
i have six siblings.
I was a librarian, but I lost my job because I was always forgetting where I put things.

participant_2.background:
I love the feeling of creating something beautiful, and I find that jewelry design is a great way to express my creativity.
I spend time with my mom and my dog and enjoy a little gossip.
I love sushi because it reminds me of the ocean, where my beta fish lives.
i like fitness.
My biggest animal sighting was a great white shark swimming beside our boat off the coast of South Africa.

content.text: Hi there. I'm a big fan of creating things with my hands.
Me too! I love to work with my hands. I'm a jewelry designer, and I love the feeling of creating something beautiful.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to make jewelry. Do you have any tips?
Sure! One tip is to start with a simple design. Don't try to make something too complicated right away.
That's a good idea. I'm not very good at drawing, so I'm not sure how I'd even start designing something.
You could always use a template or find a design online that you like.
That's a great idea! I'll have to do some research.
If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to me. I'd be happy to help.
Thanks so much! I really appreciate it.
You're welcome! I hope you have fun learning how to make jewelry.
I'm sure I will! I'm excited to try it out.
Great! I'd love to see what you make.
I'll be sure to send you some pictures.
